医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关系干预计划可以帮助夫妻感到更被重视当我们结婚或处于长期恋爱关系时，我们最终可能会认为彼此是理所当然的，而忘记表达感激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Relationship-intervention-programs-can-help- Couples-feel-more-appreciated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Relationship-intervention-programs-can-help- Couples-feel-more-appreciated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce68b016-63ee-4bd3-b97e-5d91952d4067 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:31:00 -0400 Relationship intervention programs can help couples feel more appreciated
食用葡萄可改善老年人眼睛健康的关键指标在最近的一项随机对照人体研究中，连续 16 周食用葡萄可以改善老年人眼睛健康的关键指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Grape-conspiration-improves-key-markers-of-eye-health-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Grape-conspiration-improves-key-markers-of-eye-health-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c75b3295-9962-4977-893f-595ef07fe063 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:24:00 -0400 Grape consumption improves key markers of eye health in older adults
过去5年美国医生的职业倦怠率是多少？医生倦怠是影响美国医疗保健质量和可用性的一个主要问题。这个问题的发生率不断上升，引发了最近一项旨在查明其根源的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/What-is-the-burnout-rate-among-US-physicals-over-the-past-5-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/What-is-the-burnout-rate-among-US-physicals-over-the-past-5-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=651c4076-3f30-45b8-8472-90be968797d0 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:20:00 -0400 What is the burnout rate among US physicians over the past 5 years?
对 SARS-CoV-2 变体的免疫反应差异可以为未来的疫苗设计提供信息一个人对 SARS-CoV-2（导致 COVID-19 的病毒）变体的免疫反应取决于他们之前的接触情况，而免疫反应重点的差异将有助于科学家了解未来如何优化疫苗以提供广泛的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2-variants-could-inform-future-vaccine-design.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Differences-in-immune-responses-to-SARS-CoV-2-variants-could-inform-future-vaccine-design.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9994334f-19c1-4b65-bf39-09a59c2625e9 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:18:00 -0400 Differences in immune responses to SARS-CoV-2 variants could inform future vaccine design
研究揭示了原生生物遗传密码的意外变异科学家测试了一种新的单细胞测序方法，出乎意料地改变了我们对遗传学规则的理解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Study-reveals-unexpected-variation-in-genic-code-of-protist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Study-reveals-unexpected-variation-in-genic-code-of-protist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=784e4c21-1c6f-4c61-a3a1-583ad3bc15ba Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:12:00 -0400 Study reveals unexpected variation in genetic code of protist
预先存在的 CMV 免疫力可保护母亲和婴儿免受传播和出生缺陷的影响杜兰大学的研究人员首次表明，如果母亲在怀孕前接触过这种病毒，那么她们传播一种已知会导致流产和出生缺陷的常见病毒的可能性就会大大降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Pre-existing-CMV-immunity-protects-mothers-and-babies-from-transmission-and-birth-defects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Pre-existing-CMV-immunity-protects-mothers-and-babies-from-transmission-and-birth-defects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41f992d7-08f0-4406-8f5a-273fac24a117 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:05:00 -0400 Pre-existing CMV immunity protects mothers and babies from transmission and birth defects
支持远程糖尿病自我护理的远程医疗模式研究人员开发并测试了虚拟糖尿病专科诊所 (VDiSC) 的有效性，这是一种促进远程全面糖尿病护理的虚拟模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/A-telehealth-model-to-support-remote-diabetes-self-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/A-telehealth-model-to-support-remote-diabetes-self-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500b2672-4802-4f21-bde1-46ab9deef01b Fri, 06 Oct 2023 10:54:00 -0400 A telehealth model to support remote diabetes self-care

有色人种的母亲无法了解服务提供者是否有虐待历史。为什么不？去年，当塞拉姆·所罗门·考德威尔和她的丈夫得知她怀孕时，寻找合适的妇产科医生的风险很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Mothers-of-color-cane28099t-see-if-providers-have-a-history-of-mistreatment-Why-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Mothers-of-color-cane28099t-see-if-providers-have-a-history-of-mistreatment-Why-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb1e5de0-56fc-43f2-9380-c0f6358d997b Fri, 06 Oct 2023 10:36:10 -0400 Mothers of color can’t see if providers have a history of mistreatment. Why not?
